document_data.title: An Opportunity for Profit
document_data.author: [[Dave Gross]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''An Opportunity for Profit''''' by [[Dave Gross]] is the fifth novella in the [[Double Diamond Triangle Saga]] series.

{{quote|''The pirates hired to assassinate the kidnapped [[Waterdeep]] bride are hot on their prey. Having landed on the shores of the [[Utter East]], they face great danger--all without knowing the identity of their employer. Now, as the pirates make their way across the eastern kingdoms, fate sets them on a collision course with another interested party.''}}
document_data.Summary: Continuing their quest to assassinate [[Eidola]] of Neverwinter, [[Belmer Droon]]'s hired vessel was approaching the shores of [[Doegan]]. Shortly after [[Orim Redbeard]]'s ship left the ''[[Morning Bird]]'', the crew noticed a magical rot that was devouring the hull, forcing the mercenaries to abandon the vessel and swim to the shore. Belmer Droon and his team, [[Belgin Dree]], [[Brindra Arrose]], [[Ingrar Welven]], [[Jolloth Burbuck]], [[Nargin Olnblade]], [[Sharessa Stagwood]], all survived the swim along with a big group of [[Jander Turbalt]]'s sailors. The old captain felt nothing but resentment for the ship's loss, which was only exacerbated by the apparent threat of [[fiends]] and monsters who roamed the wilderness of Doegan.  The sinking ship survivors encountered grotesque monstrosities who swarmed them, pushing them away from the sore into the forest. A stray [[bone devil]] started hunting the group, slowly culling the survivors to a small number, as they fled through the first towards civilization. The creatures slew all the sailors but the Belmer's gang. In one of the confrontations, the bone devil blinded Ingrar, and soon after, killed Brindra in one on one battle. Subsequently, the survivors reached the safety of [[Eldrinpar]]. There, captain Turbalt betrayed the group to the [[paladin]]s of [[Tyr]] who recognized the mysterious Belmer. His true identity was that of the notorious assassin [[Artemis Entreri]].
